name: Forager (itch) (Paul Kessel)
description:
Made during the A Game By Its Cover gamejam. This game was made based on this famicase made by Austin Breed in the 2020 Famicase Exhibition.

Find mushrooms to make yourself a delicious risotto, using your ancient magnifying glass and its magical powers to find the perfect ones for the recipe.

The game uses the font Europe Underground made by Måns Grebäck, and the record Running Stream Aviemore from BurghRecords for the water audio.
